long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lockwell: The Best All-In-One Cybersecurity Solution for Small Businesses

Simple. Affordable. Effective. And purpose-built for the small business. Cybersecurity for you and your team has never been this easy.

Lockwell in your browser provides fast and secure access to you and your team’s passwords. Easily view, copy, and autofill logins. Quickly create new ones. Access additional account notes or 2FA codes. And never worry about whether your data is safe – all records are stored in your encrypted password vault, conveniently safeguarded by your master password.

Please note that Lockwell is currently in closed beta, and an existing account is required to use this extension. If you’re not a customer and are interested in protecting your organization, join today at https://www.lockwell.co.


SAFEGUARDING BUSINESS ACROSS THE GLOBE

Our technology infrastructure has secured 300,000+ customers
* 721 Million leaked passwords identified
* 400+ threats discovered every minute
* 24/7 around the clock protection


CONNECT WITH US!

We highly encourage your valuable feedback as it helps us improve and refine our app, tailoring it to your unique needs. Connect with us today at support@lockwell.co
